game_description: Hilarious retro parodies & puzzles! Experience the world through the eyes, ears and chubby little hands of a baby in the 90's! Crawl your way through a zany retro sandbox experience, filled with imagination and fun! Unlock achievements, solve puzzles and hunt for hidden objects in a world of giant furniture, cute stuffed animals and awesome old toys! Use your imagination to unlock cool mini-games, and to bring your toys to life! Crawl around the house to play with all the cool toys, or just make a mess! Tear apart your sister’s diary, soak the house with a squirt gun, or find out what happens when you put a sandwich in the VCR! You can crawl your way into all kinds of mayhem, and let your imagination run wild! Step into the diapers of a baby with a fun and innocent little adventure for the whole family to enjoy! Everyone will go gaga for Baby Hands!
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Afrikaans, Akan, Albanian, Algerian Arabic, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Aromanian, Arpitan, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Azerbaijani (Turkey), Balochi Southern, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Catalan (Balear), Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), Corsican, Croatian, Danish, Dzongkha, Esperanto, Estonian, Faroese, French (Canada), French (France), Frisian, Fulah, Galician, Georgian, German, German (Switzerland), Guaraní, Gujarati, Hawaiian, Hazaragi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kabyle, Kannada, Kazakh, Kinyarwanda, Korean, Kurdish (Sorani), Lao, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maori, Marathi, Mingrelian, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian (Bokmål), Norwegian (Nynorsk), Occitan, Oriya, Pashto, Persian, Persian (Afghanistan), Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Punjabi, Rohingya, Romanian, Romansh Vallader, Russian, Russian (Ukraine), Sakha, Sanskrit, Sardinian, Scottish Gaelic, Serbian, Silesian, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, South Azerbaijani, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela), Sundanese, Swahili, Swiss German, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamazight (Central Atlas), Tamil, Tamil (Sri Lanka), Tatar, Thai, Tibetan, Tigrinya, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Walloon
review_1: I took one star away, but who knows I may update this review and add that star in the future but though I am very thankful for app lab and them releasing so many games that are wanted or requested even in there develop mental stages and the Jews before purchasing warn you of the potential risks it just stinks that they’re still so pricey in their developmental stages. My daughter doesn’t seem too interested in playing this after I paid $20 for it but I think that there’s just so many others that she prefers right now I tried playing this and had such a difficult time I gave up, but I do see the potential and only don’t recommend this to new players younger players and maybe just recommend to wait until the price tag gets cheaper and the developmental stages & bugs are worked out
review_2: I used to love watching Kindly Keyin play this game and to finally be able to play it myself made me very happy! So glad Keyin was used in the promotional material!
review_3: This game is just to fun you can fast crawl with a technique, the game play is very interesting, many secrets too, and there is so much to explore!!!
review_4: It's really fun, but there is one downside I can't turn the turtle into a ninja turtle
